data.name: Kennedy & Swiss Dreams
data.short_description: Fire up those long-distance aircraft as you set out on a transatlantic flight! The New York ARTCC is teaming up with vACC Switzerland as pilots fly one-way from Zurich (LSZH) to New York-Kennedy (KJFK).
data.description:
‘Tis the season! Christmas is at the door and people are rushing to get one of the last seats on flights from Zurich to New York. Whether returning home from boarding school in Interlaken or just trying to get some Christmas shopping done in the Big Apple, we have got you covered. vACC Switzerland and the New York ARTCC are proud to present an enticing new event: Kennedy & Swiss Dreams!

This will be our last event of 2023, so get some hot cocoa and tell maintenance to ready your favorite long haul aircraft for one last adventure this year. Join us on December 17th for a cozy transatlantic day trip form Zurich to New York-Kennedy.

Departures are expected to leave Zurich between 7am-9am Eastern (1200z-1400z) and arrive at Kennedy between 3pm-5pm Eastern (2000z-2200z). We look forward to seeing you in the Big Apple!

data.name: EDDW - EDDV Christmas Fly In
data.short_description: Come and celebrate Christmas with VATSIM Germany! Pay us a visit at Bremen or Hanover on December 17th between 17z - 21z. We keep the fields warm and have some mulled wine ready at the gates. Merry Christmas!
data.description:
VATSIM Germany invites everyone to fly into Bremen and Hanover. 17th December 2023 (1700z-2100z) - save the date! The smell of mulled wine, roasted almonds and freshly baked cookies is in the air. A motivated crew is waiting for you in Bremen & Hanover to nibble together. Join us drinking some mulled wine and enjoy the evening with us!

VATSIM Germany wishes everyone merry Christmas and in case we won't hear on frequency again this year: Happy new year 2024! 🙂

(Images: [Vectorportal.com](https://www.vectorportal.com/), [CC BY](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) and [chestnutscoop + BeammanP, deviantart.com](https://www.deviantart.com/chestnutscoop/art/MMD-MME-KiraKira-snowV2-Effect-Download-849352158), [CC BY-NC](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/))

data.name: 12 Days of Adria - Day 4 | LDDU
data.short_description: VATAdria presents to you: 12 Days of Adria - Day 4 | Dubrovnik
data.description:
The festive season is here and for the past few months the events team have been planning on how we can make this Christmas a special one for Adria. The result is the most exciting event series Adria has seen to date: 12 Days of Adria. This Christmas, for the 11 days from the 14th leading up to the 25th of December, Adria will open a different airport each day, culminating in our longest event of the series, with an airport that you don't want to miss which will be open for at least 6 hours on Christmas Day, giving you plenty of options to fly if you're stumped with what to do if you don't celebrate Christmas on the 25th, or if your celebrations are over and perhaps you have some new peripherals to try!

On day 4 we will be opening....

Dubrovnik (LDDU)

We will be opening Dubrovnik from the hours of 17z-20z on the 17th of December. We hope that you will be able to join us at some point between the 14th and 25th of December to help make this event series, the biggest Adria has ever seen! We hope to see you there!

data.name: Amsterdam – Dublin City Shuttle

routes.route: BERGI L602 SUPUR L60 PENIL UL28 LELDO M145 BAGSO
ENDEQ Q36 ALAVA Z195 MALUD UL975 WAL M16 DOLAS L603 LAMSO

data.short_description: VATéir and the Dutch VACC are excited to invite you to the Amsterdam – Dublin City Shuttle! Fly between the Irish and Dutch capitals on the 17th of December, between 1830 and 2200z!
data.description: **VATéir** and the **Dutch VACC** are excited to invite you to the **Amsterdam – Dublin City Shuttle**! Fly between the Irish and Dutch capitals on the **17th of December**, starting at **1830z**. The event will run until **2200z**, so you can squeeze in a return sector and make the most of the ATC available. We both look forward to welcoming you to Dublin and Amsterdam, and taking advantage of our top class ATC! See you there!

data.name: Stuttgart Sunday
data.short_description: Prepare for Stuttgart Sunday! No matter whether you are flying a small plane or a jet, IFR or VFR, if it flies it is welcome here.
data.description:
**Prepare for Stuttgart Sunday!** No matter whether you are flying a small plane or a jet, IFR or VFR, if it flies it is welcome here. From 20:00lcl to 22:00lcl (18:00z to 20:00z in the summer and **19:00z to 21:00z in the winter**) there will be a mix of old stagers and new trainees controlling for you. Fly from Stuttgart over the Swabian Jura, to Lake Constance or follow the Neckar to the Rhine. As destination for your IFR-Flights we would recommend Hanover, where RG Bremen is performing Hanover Onlineday and you can almost be sure of full ATC coverage.

**Charts:** [chartfox.org/EDDS](https://chartfox.org/EDDS) **Pilot Briefing:** [vats.im/edds](https://vats.im/edds)

data.name: [EKDK_CTR] | C1 Exam
data.short_description: Come and fly in Denmark to help Jeppe Seier prove his worthiness of the C1 rating on his checkout the 17th, 19-21Z.
data.description:
Come and fly in Denmark to help Jeppe Seier prove his worthiness of the C1 rating. Whether you take out a small propeller aircraft or a bigger jet aircraft the traffic is as always more than welcome, either IFR or VFR.

Charts can be found at: https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/denmark/

data.name: Turn Around Budapest
data.short_description: We kindly invite every pilot to Turn around Budapest on Mondays - a weekly event featuring Full ATC coverage over the Hungarian airspace.
data.description:
Turn Around Budapest

From 18z until 21z you can expect full coverage in the Hungarian airspace, including LHBP - Budapest, LHDC - Debrecen and LHSM - Sármellék/Hévíz-Balaton.
Grab a cup of tea or some snacks and plan for a great evening in the Budapest FIR.

[Briefing](http://vacchun.hu/en/repuloterek/)
[Charts](http://vacchun.hu/en/terkepek-es-scenery/)

data.name: Vienna Trainee-Night
data.short_description: We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" on every second Monday! During this time, we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies!
data.description:
Dear pilots!
We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" every second Monday! During this time we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies! Take the chance to support us in training our controllers by visiting one of the airports, no matter if you fly VFR or IFR and enjoy the additional opportunity to visit Vienna during full staffing! Our trainees will be glad to be provided with a lot of traffic to get their controlling to the next level!
We are looking forward to welcoming you!
Charts and Briefing: [Charts](https://www.vacc-austria.org/?page=content/chartlist&icao=LOWW) | [Briefing](https://downloads.vacc-austria.org/Documents/Briefings/2019_VIE_Briefing_V1.3.pdf)
See you in the skies!

data.name: Vectors to Copenhagen
data.short_description: Come get Vectors to final in Copenhagen! We are ready once again Monday already from 18z with full staffing. Come join!
data.description:
VATSIM-Scandinavia and Copenhagen FIR would like to invite you to our expanded weekly event **Vectors to Copenhagen.** Three hours full staffing from 18z-21z the team of VATSIM-Scandinavia controllers will be ready to get you into the beautiful capital of Denmark. 

Start you flight early to land for a Turnaround in Copenhagen with plenty of time to get back, or do it the other way around. Three hours is plenty of time to visit many beautiful sites around Europe and back. Be be aware! The later you come the more severe the traffic will be! 

Check your charts, get your airplane out the hangar and we will see you there! 

[Briefings, Charts and everything you need to know is here!](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/ekch/)

[Check the ATC bookings here](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org)

data.name: Lapland Tuesday
data.short_description: See and touch the magic of Lapland every Tuesday during the winter! Three of Lapland's biggest airports are fully staffed and serving virtual Lapland travelers the whole winter season!
data.description:
Airport briefing and charts:

* [EFRO](https://wiki.vatsim-scandinavia.org/books/finnish-airports-charts/page/efro-rovaniemi)
* [EFIV](https://wiki.vatsim-scandinavia.org/books/finnish-airports-charts/page/efiv-ivalo)

data.name: BERlin Tuesday
data.short_description: Every Tuesday we invite you to Germany's newest airport! Encounter experienced controllers motivated and ready to get you down safely into our capital.
data.description:
We invite you every Tuesday to our weekly Online-Day. From 18:30-21:30z you can enjoy our professional ATC services at the capital city airport Berlin Brandenburg. Expect perfectly managed transitions, crowded aprons and lots of movement on the parallel runways. No matter whether you want to fly IFR or VFR, there will be always some room for your favourite aircraft in our modern designed airspace. Don't hesitate, start your sim and give us a visit, we can't wait to see you! In case you forgot to carry the EFB with you or you aren't really familiar with our procedures, we got you covered:

You can find charts at: https://chartfox.org/EDDB Check out our briefing at: http://vats.im/eddb

data.name: [LEPA_TWR] | S2 Exam
data.short_description: Come and fly to Palma (LEPA) and help Enrique earn his S2 rating! Arrivals and departures are welcome, no matter whether you fly VFR or IFR. The exam will take place on December 20th, from 1800z until 2000z. Enrique will be glad to see you! Wish him "Buena Suerte"
data.description:
Come and fly to ***Palma*** (***LEPA***) and help **Enrique Ferreiro** earn his **S2** rating! Arrivals and departures are welcome, no matter whether you fly ***VFR*** or ***IFR***. The exam will take place on December 20th, from 1800z until 2000z. Enrique Ferreiro will be glad to see you! Wish him "Buena Suerte".

* Charts: https://aip.enaire.es/AIP/AIP-en.html

data.name: Czech Online Day
data.short_description: Czech Online Day takes place every Wednesday between 18 and 21 UTC at LKAA FIR. You can expect full ATC coverage at Prague LKPR.
data.description: Czech Online Day takes place every Wednesday between 18 and 21 UTC at LKAA FIR. You can expect full ATC coverage at Prague LKPR.

data.name: Slovak Online Day
data.short_description: Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!
data.description:
Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!

About Slovak Online Day:

-Starting event from 18:00z to 21:00z every Wednesday

-Full ATC coverage in Slovakia

-Friendly Slovak controllers will take you safely to your destinations

For sceneries and charts, visit [http://vacc-slovakia.sk/](http://vacc-slovakia.sk)

See you in there !

data.name: EDDM - München Mittwoch
data.short_description: Welcome to our weekly "München - Mittwoch". Every Wednesday from 1830z to 2130z, all pilots are cordially invited to the Munich Airport (EDDM) with experienced controllers who will guide you safely through the Munich airspace. Whether IFR or VFR, everyone is welcome!
data.description: Welcome to our weekly "München - Mittwoch". Every Wednesday from 1830z to 2130z, all pilots are cordially invited to the Munich Airport (EDDM) with experienced controllers who will guide you safely through the Munich airspace. Whether IFR or VFR, everyone is welcome!

data.name: VACC-Austria Weekly Wednesday
data.short_description: Weekly Wednesday - every Wednesday - 1830-2130z - FULL ATC in Austria
data.description:
Enjoy extended coverage of FULL ATC across the entire country. Take your favourite aircraft out of the hanger for a spin to our majors Vienna (LOWW) and/or the infamous Innsbruck Airport (LOWI). Alternatively enjoy a flight to our breath-taking minors: Salzburg (LOWS), Graz (LOWG), Klagenfurt (LOWK) or Linz (LOWL). Of course, we are providing full CPDLC and PDC service along the way!

Take a break from your busy schedule and enjoy an evening with 3 hours of guaranteed ATC-service "as real as it gets"! We are very excited to welcome you to one of our airports!

data.name: Roma nights
data.short_description: Dear pilots, VATITA is welcoming you all to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from the top to the bottom, also covering the airports of Fiumicino (LIRF) and Ciampino (LIRA).
data.description:
Dear pilots, **VATITA is welcoming you all** to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer **just the best of services,** from the top to the bottom, covering the airports of Fiumicino (**LIRF**) and Ciampino (**LIRA**).

Pick your favorite plane, and fly in and out of our beautiful country, maybe connecting with our dear neighbors!
Theres something for everyone, so contact Roma on 124.200!

[LIRF Pilot Briefing, sceneries and charts](https://www.vats.im/it/LIRFBrief)

data.name: Welcome to HEL
data.short_description: VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki Airport will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.

A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.

See you on Thursday!

[Briefing](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/efhk/) and [Charts](https://www.ais.fi/aip/ad/efhk/efhk.htm)

data.name: Hamburg Thursday
data.short_description: Every Thursday we invite you to visit the world's oldest commercial airport, in the North... of Germany, in Hamburg Fuhlsbüttel! So hop on your aircraft, no matter if large or small, we are looking forward to seeing you fly between 19z and 21z!
data.description: Every Thursday we invite you to visit the world's oldest commercial airport, in the North... of Germany, in Hamburg Fuhlsbüttel! So hop on your aircraft, no matter if large or small, we are looking forward to seeing you fly between 19z and 21z!

data.name: VFR XMAS
data.short_description: Come fly VFR between Biella Torino and Aosta, celebrate with us Christmas!
data.description:
Come fly **VFR** between Biella Torino and Aosta, celebrate with us Christmas!
Those airports are three little gems of northern Italy, you'll have the chance to fly a complex traffic pattern (at **LIMA**), enjoy the beautiful alps (at **LIMW**) and discover the home airport of our **vATO** where it all began (**LILE**).
Still want to fly IFR? Torino **LIMF** has you covered with some new fancy rnav arrival procedures!

Not sure how to navigate VFR in italian airspace? Check this briefing from a previous event:
[VFR event briefing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/19c9AGncwuzWqWKRCxTWqVuC4gnm0gD1i/view?usp=drive_link)

data.name: 12 Days of Adria - Day 9 | Solstice in Sarajevo
data.short_description: VATAdria presents to you: 12 Days of Adria - Day 9 | Solstice in Sarajevo
data.description:
The festive season is here and the events team have spent months planning on how we can make this Christmas a special one for Adria. The result is the most exciting event series Adria has seen to date: 12 Days of Adria. This Christmas, for the 11 days leading up to the 25th of December, Adria will open a different airport each day, culminating in our longest event of the series, with an airport that you don't want to miss which will be open for at least 6 hours on Christmas Day, giving you plenty of options to fly if you're stumped with what to do if you don't celebrate Christmas on the 25th, or if your celebrations are over and perhaps you have some new peripherals to try!

Today, on the day of the Winter Solstice we are opening...

Sarajevo (LQSA)

We will be opening this airport from the hours of 17z-20z on the 22nd of December. We hope that you will be able to join us at some point between the 14th and 25th of December to help make this event series, the biggest Adria has ever seen! We hope to see you there!

data.name: Acropolis Nights
data.short_description: Join us every Friday for a breathtaking experience over the iconic city of Athens. Acropolis Nights, hosted by Hellenic vACC, is your weekly opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of aviation and explore Athens like never before! See you there!
data.description: Join us every Friday for a breathtaking experience over the iconic city of Athens. Acropolis Nights, hosted by Hellenic vACC, is your weekly opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of aviation and explore Athens like never before. Our experienced controllers will make sure to provide you with full ATC coverage over Athens International Airport ''Eleftherios Venizelos" whilst you enjoy the spectacular views over the Acropolis. So what are you waiting for? Mark your calendars and we will see you in our virtual skies!

data.name: Istanbul Online
data.short_description: Europe's biggest and busiest airport, Istanbul Airport (LTFM) is waiting for you this Friday! Join us for friendly and quality ATC service between 17:00z - 20:00z and experience parallel approaches unlike other before! Don't forget to check out the special wiki page we prepared!
data.description:
Europe's biggest and busiest airport, **Istanbul Airport (LTFM)** is waiting for you this Friday! Join us for friendly and quality ATC service between **17:00z - 20:00z** and experience parallel approaches unlike other before! Don't forget to check out the special wiki page we have prepared for you as well! See you in the radar!

[https://wiki.trvacc.net/wiki/Istanbul_Airport](https://wiki.trvacc.net/wiki/Istanbul_Airport)

data.name: [IST_APP] | S3 Exam
data.short_description: Help Kai get his S3 rating on IST_APP, which covers Istanbul TMA on 22 Dec 2023 between 18z - 20z!
data.description: Help Kai get his S3 rating on IST_APP, which covers Istanbul TMA on 22 Dec 2023 between 18z - 20z! All VFR and IFR flights welcome!

data.name: Discover Romania
data.short_description: From 18z onwards, hop on over to one of our staffed airports: Chisinau LUKK or Bucharest LROP. And guess what? Every Friday, we open the gates to three more airports, just for YOU. So, let's go on an adventure and Discover Romania!
data.description:
vACC Romania invite pilots to the "Discover Romania" event! Picture this: 2 airports for 3 hours of realistic control, every Friday evening starting at 18 UTC. This week, we're featuring LUKK and LROP. You can take off and land from anywhere you fancy. The key? Exploring the beauty of Romania! See you there!

[Charts and Sceneries](https://rovacc.ro/)

data.name: Saturday Night Ops Budapest
data.short_description: Enjoy the night as you fly in/out of the Hungarian capital from 1800z, every second Saturday!
data.description:
Every two weeks, we light up the airspace over LHBP - Budapest so you can enjoy the night as you fly in/out of the Hungarian capital with a beautiful evening scenery! Budapest can easily facilitate large jets as well as small GAs, so feel free to grab your favourite aircraft and join the event! You can expect coverage from 18:00z. See you there!

Briefing Charts: [https://vacchun.hu/en/terkepek-es-scenery/](http://)

data.name: Cologne-Bonn Wednesday
data.short_description:
The Cologne-Onlineday will take place every wednesday of the month.
Enjoy the beautiful city of Cologne and the landscapes next to the Rhine visually in your VFR-hopper.
data.description:
The Cologne-Onlineday will take place every wednesday of the month.
Enjoy the beautiful city of Cologne and the landscapes next to the Rhine visually in your VFR-hopper, or in your favourite Airliner. 
As every wednesday our colleagues in Munich and Austria kindly invite you to their air.

data.description:
Enjoy extended coverage of FULL ATC across the entire country. Take your favourite aircraft out of the hanger for a spin to our majors Vienna (LOWW) and/or the infamous Innsbruck Airport (LOWI). Alternatively enjoy a flight to our breath-taking minors: Salzburg (LOWS), Graz (LOWG), Klagenfurt (LOWK) or Linz (LOWL). Of course, we are providing full CPDLC and PDC service along the way!

Take a break from your busy schedule and enjoy an evening with 3 hours of guaranteed ATC-service "as real as it gets"! We are very excited to welcome you to one of our airports!

data.name: New year in Milano
data.short_description: From all of us at Vatita, a happy holidays and a joyful new year! You are officially invited to our New Year in Milano! Hang out with us, fly in, fly out, fly through, it doesn't really matter to us, as long as you're there to celebrate with us!
data.description:
Dear pilots,
from all of us at Vatita, a happy holidays and a joyful new year! Hopefully we'll have a nicer quieter and beautifuller 2024, but in the meantime, to celebrate this year's accomplishments and to thank you for your involvement in our community's growth, you are officially invited to our New Year in Milano!
Wednesday December the 28th, from 20.00z to 22.00z, hang out with us, fly in, fly out, fly through, it doesn't really matter to us, as long as you're there to celebrate with us!
We'll offer you only the best controlling and a nice way to escape family dinners when you don't want to talk with your third-degree aunt who only tries to pinch your cheeks since you were born.


[LIMC pilot briefing, charts and sceneries](https://vats.im/it/LIMCBrief)

data.name: Welcome to HEL
data.short_description: VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki Airport will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.

A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.

See you on Thursday!

[Briefing](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/efhk/) and [Charts](https://www.ais.fi/aip/ad/efhk/efhk.htm)

data.name: EDWW FIR Evening
data.short_description: Only individual airports in the Bremen FIR are open? Why not all of them? The Bremen FIR invites you from now on Thursdays every three weeks between 1830z and 2100z to its Onlineday. From a new capital airport to one of the oldest airports in Germany with exciting runway crossing
data.description: Only individual airports in the Bremen FIR are open? Why not all of them? The Bremen FIR invites you from now on Thursdays every three weeks between 1830z and 2100z to its Onlineday. From a new capital airport to one of the oldest airports in Germany with exciting runway crossing

data.name: Vienna Trainee-Night
data.short_description: We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" on every second Monday! During this time, we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies!
data.description:
Dear pilots!
We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" every second Monday! During this time we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies! Take the chance to support us in training our controllers by visiting one of the airports, no matter if you fly VFR or IFR and enjoy the additional opportunity to visit Vienna during full staffing! Our trainees will be glad to be provided with a lot of traffic to get their controlling to the next level!
We are looking forward to welcoming you!
Charts and Briefing: [Charts](https://www.vacc-austria.org/?page=content/chartlist&icao=LOWW) | [Briefing](https://downloads.vacc-austria.org/Documents/Briefings/2019_VIE_Briefing_V1.3.pdf)
See you in the skies!

data.name: Düsseldorf Monday
data.short_description: We open our training airport Düsseldorf (EDDL) from ground to center for you every week and you are cordially invited to your flight.
data.description:
No matter whether you want to explore the beautiful Rhineland and Ruhr area by VFR or whether you want to start or end an IFR short, medium or long-haul flight.

Discover the versatility of the airport from a different angle and have a look.

We hope to hear you on our frequency.

data.name: Lapland Tuesday
data.short_description: See and touch the magic of Lapland every Tuesday during the winter! Three of Lapland's biggest airports are fully staffed and serving virtual Lapland travelers the whole winter season!
data.description:
Airport briefing and charts:

* [EFRO](https://wiki.vatsim-scandinavia.org/books/finnish-airports-charts/page/efro-rovaniemi)
* [EFIV](https://wiki.vatsim-scandinavia.org/books/finnish-airports-charts/page/efiv-ivalo)
* [EFKT](https://wiki.vatsim-scandinavia.org/books/finnish-airports-charts/page/efkt-kittila)

data.name: [ESGG_TWR] | S2 Exam
data.short_description: Melvin is having his S2 check at ESGG on the 3rd of January 17,30-19,30z.
data.description:
Come and help Melvin prove his worthiness of the S2 rating. Take out your small propeller aircraft, helicopter, or jet aircraft and fly to/from ESGG either IFR och VFR.

Charts can be found here: https://aro.lfv.se/Editorial/View/IAIP?folderId=31

data.name: Slovak Online Day
data.short_description: Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!
data.description:
**Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!**

About Slovak Online Day:

-Starting event from 18:00z to 21:00z every Wednesday

-Full ATC coverage in Slovakia

-Friendly Slovak controllers will take you safely to your destinations

For sceneries and charts, visit [http://vacc-slovakia.sk/](http://vacc-slovakia.sk/)

See you in there !

Alternatively enjoy a flight to our breath-taking minors: Salzburg (LOWS), Graz (LOWG), Klagenfurt (LOWK) or Linz (LOWL). Of course, we are providing full CPDLC and PDC service along the way!

Take a break from your busy schedule and enjoy an evening with 3 hours of guaranteed ATC-service "as real as it gets"! We are very excited to welcome you to one of our airports!

data.name: Roma Nights
data.short_description: Dear pilots, VATITA is welcoming you all to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from the top to the bottom, also covering the airports of Fiumicino (LIRF) and Ciampino (LIRA).
data.description:
Dear pilots, **VATITA is welcoming you all** to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer **just the best of services,** from the top to the bottom, covering the airports of Fiumicino (**LIRF**) and Ciampino (**LIRA**).

Pick your favorite plane, and fly in and out of our beautiful country, maybe connecting with our dear neighbors!
Theres something for everyone, so contact Roma on 124.200!

[LIRF Pilot Briefing, sceneries and charts](https://www.vats.im/it/LIRFBrief)

data.name: Paris By Night
data.short_description: Like every first Friday of the month you are welcome in Paris ! On Friday 5th of January, come fly from/to Paris Charles de Gaulle (LFPG) from 1930z to 22z. Experience Paris Charles de Gaulle at its busiest, with fully ATC coverage !
data.description: Like every first Friday of the month you are welcome in Paris ! On Friday 5th of January, come fly from/to Paris Charles de Gaulle (LFPG) from 1930z to 22z. Experience Paris Charles de Gaulle at its busiest, with fully ATC coverage ! Come and experience multiple frequencies changes, parallel approaches in one of the busiest airport in the world ! ✈️

data.name: Cross the Nordic Seas

routes.route: OSKUM DCT 63N010W DCT IPTON DCT ETNOR
REKLI DCT ERSER DCT ING DCT NASBU

data.short_description: Embark on a virtual journey across the Nordic Seas with VATSIM Scandinavia's "Cross the Nordic Seas!" Immerse yourself in the stunning landscapes and challenging approaches of Bergen (ENBR), Vagar (EKVG), and Keflavik (BIKF.) Join this cross country adventure!
data.description: Embark on a virtual journey across the Nordic Seas with VATSIM Scandinavia's "Cross the Nordic Seas," hosted by Norway, Iceland, and Denmark! Navigate the scenic skies and immerse yourself in the stunning landscapes and challenging approaches of Bergen (ENBR), Vagar (EKVG), and Keflavik (BIKF.) Join aviation enthusiasts in this cross-country adventure, showcasing the beauty of Nordic aviation and the collaborative spirit of VATSIM Scandinavia.

data.name: European Overload 2024
data.short_description: Get ready to join a spectacular event across Europe in the European Overload, brought to you by VATEUD and VATSIM UK. This event offers an unparalleled opportunity to fly through some of Europe's most iconic and diverse airspaces.
data.description:
Get ready to join a spectacular event across Europe in the **European Overload**, brought to you by **VATEUD and VATSIM UK**. This event offers an unparalleled opportunity to fly through some of Europe's most iconic and diverse airspaces.

This year's European Overload Event promises an immersive experience, covering a vast range of European countries. From the Nordic fjords to the Mediterranean coast, this event is a celebration of Europe's rich and varied landscapes and cultures.

This event is all about your choices and experiences. Whether you prefer buzzing city airports or tranquil regional hubs, there's a flight path for every preference.

So take a seat in your cockpit, prepare for your flights and let us light up Europe on **January 13 from 1500 - 2000z**!


To ensure that everything runs smoothly on the day, we have put together a few useful links for you:

* Charts: [chartfox.org](https://chartfox.org)
* Routes: [grd.aero-nav.com](https://grd.aero-nav.com)
